title: Almatica
content:
Hey!   
   
I'm on a new typography. Almatica.   
   
I't started as part of a logo that i designed, then i liked it so much that decided to complete it on a full family.   
   
I'd like to see what you think about it, wich characters work and wich ones don't. Anything.   
   
Thank You.   
   
Saludos desde M
author: mtlns

comments.content: very interesting work. uc S seems a bit narrow, uc C a bit long on the bottom, please upload pdf so we can get a closer look. a very original looking design-congratulations

Thank for your comments Ole. I'm gonna work some more versions of S, I think that C needs to have that long base because of it's plain bottom, but i'll work on it too. Here is the PDF file. Take a closer look. .


AlmaticaBetaV.pdf (505.3 k)

Top of uc G is a bit long, as is the hook on lc r. 7 leans a bit to the right.   
   
You might have kerning issues given the variation in letter shapes, though.

Here are some changes i've made. Check them out. I also want to ask you guys what do you think about the Proportion of the middle letters to capital ones is correct. About the Kerning, i need some help on that. Does anybody have a Guide to kern this family?
